post.title: I was told that to get more Rep, I should post here how much I love Ruqqus

body: No. You can't just "say" you love Ruqqus. You have to look it right in it's fucking eyes and mean it. Hearing claims of love and FEELING that love are two different things. Listen to some Brian Adams, Boyz II Men and the Dirty Dancing soundtrack and try again!
body_html: No. You can't just "say" you love Ruqqus. You have to look it right in it's fucking eyes and mean it. Hearing claims of love and FEELING that love are two different things. Listen to some Brian Adams, Boyz II Men and the Dirty Dancing soundtrack and try again!

post.title: I was told that to get more Rep, I should post here how much I love Ruqqus

body:
I heard about this a couple of days ago, so I signed up.

As long as I'm allowed to speak, even if it's unpopular (as long as my speech would be protected by the first amendment ofc), then I'll like the site enough.

I heard about this a couple of days ago, so I signed up.
